title: Firefox for Android 51.0.3 Release

notes.note:
Reference link for [51.0.2 release notes for Firefox for Android][1]


  [1]: https://www.mozilla.com/firefox/android/51.0.2/releasenotes/

Fix a build issue which was causing some crashes on some x86 architectures  ([bug 1337290][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1337290

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
